stories.storyTldr: Students share how Saint Stephen's teachers make a difference in their lives
stories.achievement: Building strong relationships with dedicated teachers who truly care
stories.parentQuote: The teacher-student relationships at SSES are transformative
stories.studentQuote: Our teachers really know us and help us grow as individuals
outcomeHighlights: Families cite transformational teacher partnerships across divisions

stories.storyTldr: Students excelling in academics and preparing for top universities
stories.achievement: High academic achievement with personalized support and advanced opportunities
stories.parentQuote: The academic rigor prepares students for success at top colleges
stories.studentQuote: The academic programs here challenge us to reach our full potential
outcomeHighlights: Students earn admission to top universities with strong academic portfolios

stories.storyTldr: Creative student thriving in Saint Stephen's supportive arts environment
stories.achievement: Flourishing in multiple creative disciplines with dedicated faculty support
stories.parentQuote: The arts program has helped Betsy discover her creative voice
stories.studentQuote: The teachers here really understand how to nurture creativity
outcomeHighlights: Students showcase original work in campus galleries and performances

stories.storyTldr: Student athletes excelling on the field and in the classroom
stories.achievement: Championship success while maintaining academic excellence
stories.parentQuote: SSES proves you can be a champion athlete and top student
stories.studentQuote: Our coaches teach us to win with character and integrity
outcomeHighlights: Teams capture state titles while maintaining high GPAs

stories.storyTldr: Highlights from Falcons athletics and team spirit
stories.achievement: Competing and excelling across multiple sports programs
stories.parentQuote: The program builds both character and competitive drive.
stories.studentQuote: I love pushing myself and supporting my teammates.

stories.storyTldr: Lower School parents share the welcoming, supportive community
stories.achievement: Nurturing foundation with outstanding teacher relationships
stories.parentQuote: The Lower School feels like a family where our child is known and supported.
outcomeHighlights: Families note seamless transition into the SSES lower school family

stories.storyTldr: Sophia and Camden discuss how starting in 7th grade, they love the community feeling at Saint Stephen's
stories.achievement: Finding belonging and community connection starting in middle school
stories.parentQuote: They found their place immediately in the welcoming Saint Stephen's community
stories.studentQuote: We love the community feeling here - everyone knows each other and cares
outcomeHighlights: Students thrive academically while finding instant belonging in middle school

stories.storyTldr: Mak shares his passion for athletics at Saint Stephen's
stories.achievement: Excellence in athletics with strong team spirit and dedication
stories.parentQuote: The athletic program has developed both his skills and character
stories.studentQuote: Athletics here teaches you discipline and teamwork that applies everywhere
outcomeHighlights: Junior balances rigorous academics with varsity soccer and lacrosse success

stories.storyTldr: Leah and Jaida highlight the benefits of small class sizes and athletics at Saint Stephen's
stories.achievement: Thriving in small class environments while excelling in athletics
stories.parentQuote: The small class sizes allow for personalized attention that makes all the difference
stories.studentQuote: Small classes mean teachers really know us, and we can excel in both sports and academics
outcomeHighlights: Sophomore and junior excel in volleyball and track while thriving in small classes

stories.storyTldr: Keymani discusses balancing athletics and academics at Saint Stephen's
stories.achievement: Successfully balancing high-level athletics with academic excellence
stories.parentQuote: Saint Stephen's teaches students how to excel in multiple areas simultaneously
stories.studentQuote: Here you don't have to choose between sports and academics - you can excel at both
outcomeHighlights: Track state champion channels writing passion within a supportive school culture

stories.storyTldr: Julie shares her passion for journalism, social media, and community engagement
stories.achievement: Developing journalism and media skills while building community connections
stories.parentQuote: The program has helped her find her voice and passion for storytelling
stories.studentQuote: I love using journalism and social media to tell our school's story and connect our community
outcomeHighlights: Upper school journalist amplifies campus stories across digital channels

stories.storyTldr: Isabelle discusses her athletic journey and experiences at Saint Stephen's
stories.achievement: Athletic excellence with strong competitive spirit and team dedication
stories.parentQuote: The athletic program has built her confidence and leadership skills
stories.studentQuote: Athletics here pushes you to be your best while supporting your teammates
outcomeHighlights: Upper school athlete balances soccer, volleyball, and student government

stories.storyTldr: Grace and Pearson share their involvement in clubs and academic excellence
stories.achievement: Leading in both academic pursuits and extracurricular club involvement
stories.parentQuote: The variety of opportunities allows them to explore their interests and develop leadership
stories.studentQuote: There are so many clubs and academic opportunities - you can really find your passion here
outcomeHighlights: Students pair top academics with extensive club leadership roles
